verses.text: Happy \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* man who gives thought \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* poor; \w the|strong="H1732"\w* Lord will \w be|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* saviour \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* time \w of|strong="H1732"\w* trouble.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w him|strong="H0413"\w* safe, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* give \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*; \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* let \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* blessing \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not give \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* haters.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* support \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* bed \w of|strong="H0776"\w* pain: \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* all \w his|strong="H8104"\w* grief \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; make \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul well, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* faith \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* haters \w say|strong="H0559"\w* evil \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H0559"\w* come \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* end?

If \w one|strong="H8034"\w* comes \w to|strong="H0559"\w* see \w me|strong="H4191"\w*, deceit \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* heart; \w he|strong="H0559"\w* keeps \w a|strong="H4191"\w* store \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, which \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w makes|strong="H0559"\w* public \w in|strong="H4191"\w* every place.

All \w my|strong="H7200"\w* haters \w are|strong="H3820"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* secretly \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w*; \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w are|strong="H3820"\w* designing \w my|strong="H7200"\w* downfall.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* say, \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* disease, which \w will|strong="H3605"\w* not let \w him|strong="H5921"\w* go: \w and|strong="H3605"\w* now \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3605"\w* not get \w up|strong="H5921"\w* again.

\w Even|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* dearest friend, \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* faith, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* took bread \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* turned \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, O Lord, \w have|strong="H0834"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, lifting \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* punishment.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0859"\w*, because \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hater \w does|strong="H3068"\w* not overcome \w me|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* support \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness, giving \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* place \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* face \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

May \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel \w be|strong="H5769"\w* praised, through \w eternal|strong="H5769"\w* \w days|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. \w So|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*. \w So|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*.
